title: Mini-Ep 242: Totally Nailed It
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 242: Totally Nailed It
itunes:subtitle: Kate’s youngest determines that skincare is not, in fact, a scam, and Doree gives an update on her time with a personal stylist. Then, they hear from listeners about all things nail care. Plus, Kate and Doree host another installment of “Remember Ye Ol...
description:
Kate’s youngest determines that skincare is not, in fact, a scam, and Doree gives an update on her time with a personal stylist. Then, they hear from listeners about all things nail care. Plus, Kate and Doree host another installment of “Remember Ye Olden Times.”


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach them at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything they mention on the show.
  • Follow the podcast on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter
